title: Learner-Centered Continuous Professional Development Course for Engineering Professionals in Hazardous Industries

context.prior_knowledge: Basic safety management in hazardous industrial environments and engineering problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: A course where current practitioners deepen expertise by learner-led resolution of risk management issues arising in real work contexts

learning_goals: Learners analyze real-world cases from hazardous industrial settings to develop action plans that improve safety decision-making processes
Learners collaborate with peer experts to design and implement field-centered problem-solving strategies
Learners develop personalized learning roadmaps that promote continuous learning in their work environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
